OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord prior taxane use ( yes v ) , number prior chemotherapy regimens metastatic disease ( 0 vs 1 ) , participate center . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour day 1 . Courses repeat every 21 day . - Arm II : Patients receive docetaxel IV 30 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 . Courses repeat every 28 day . Treatment continue arm absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 3 week , 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 month , annually 4 year .
